# Normal vowels
ɑ f[a]ther aː ɑː
æ c[a]t
ɛ b[e]d ɜ ɜː
i cit[y] iː
ɪ s[i]t ɨ
ɔ l[aw] ɔː ɒ
ʊ p[u]t ʊ̯
ʌ r[u]n
u s[oo]n uː

# Schwas
ə [a]llow
ɚ corn[er] ɝː ɝ

# Dipthongs
eɪ r[ai]se e eɪ̯
aɪ r[i]ce aɪ̯
oʊ kn[ow] o
ɔɪ n[oi]se
aʊ h[ou]se

# Stops
p [p]in
b [b]ut
t [t]on
d [d]ot
k [c]at
ɡ [g]ive g

# Affricatives
t͡ʃ [ch]in tʃ
d͡ʒ [g]in dʒ

# Fricatives
f [f]in
v [v]im
θ [th]in
ð [th]is
s [s]et
z [z]ing
ʃ [s]ure
ʒ mea[sure]
h [h]am

# Other consonants
l [l]ong l̩ ɫ ʟ̩ l̩
m [m]ock m̩
n [kn]ock n̩
ŋ thi[ng]
ɹ [wr]ong r ɾ
w [w]asp
j [y]acht
